company.name: Yoonet
company.description: Your complete guide to the Yoonet sales process, from initial inquiry to successful onboarding.

stages.name: Inquiry
stages.description: Lead enters the system. Client record created in Bubble. Visible to Ben, Em, and Nicole.
stages.exitCriteria: Client exists in Bubble, inquiry acknowledged

entryPoints.name: Organic Inquiry
entryPoints.description: Inbound lead from website, SEO, content

entryPoints.name: Referral
entryPoints.description: Word of mouth, existing client referral

stages.name: Engaged
stages.description: Prospect is actively engaged. Booking link sent, time scheduled. Form being prepared. Nurturing content flowing.
stages.goal: Schedule meeting and prepare bespoke assessment
activities: Send booking link with 'Form coming soon' message
Create bespoke Partner Assessment Form (with Claude)
Approve and send form to client
Automated welcome sequence with portal access
Deliver Investment Guide with pricing transparency

stages.name: Discovery
stages.description: Assessment completed, meeting held. Ben understands their needs, challenges, and fit.
stages.exitCriteria: Meeting complete, clear understanding of needs
activities: Automated email notification to Ben, Em, Nicole

stages.name: Proposal
stages.description: Em and Nicole create proposal based on Ben's insights. Solution designed, pricing prepared, proposal page built.
stages.goal: Present tailored solution with clear next steps
activities: Ben captures meeting insights and requirements
Define timing and implementation next steps

stages.name: Onboarding
stages.description: Client accesses Bubble with PIN. Recruitment process begins. Transition from sales to delivery.
stages.exitCriteria: Client active in Bubble, recruitment initiated
activities: Client receives proposal with PIN and Bubble link

team.name: Em
responsibilities: Work with Claude for form generation

nurturing.name: Welcome + Portal
nurturing.description: Introduces portal access to the prospect

notifications.name: Assessment Completion
notifications.description: Alerts team when client completes form
